name: InCloudCounsel
slogan: Freeing our valued customers and attorney partners from their past constraints
description: InCloudCounsel manages and processes high volume, repetitive legal documents for large enterprises.  InCloud does this by blending cloud-based software tools with a virtual network of the best solo practitioners in North America and Europe.  Our products help our clients lower costs, increase quality and consistency, and enhance document and legal data management.

team.name: Ben Levi
team.bioHtml: Founder at @InCloudCounsel. Lawyered at @Kirkland and Ellis. Schooled at @Yale University & @Harvard Law School. Mostly pleasant.

team.title: CTO/Co-Founder
team.name: Lane Lillquist
team.bioHtml: CTO and Founder InCloudCounsel. Formally VP of Engineering at Uversity.

team.name: Troy Pospisil
team.bioHtml: Founder and CEO of InCloudCounsel, investor

team.title: Managing Director
team.name: Kathryn Caterina
team.bioHtml: Managing Director at InCloudCounsel - Los Angeles

jobs.title: UK-Qualified Solicitor | Remote | Part-Time
jobs.description:
Interested in becoming a legal consultant with our UK law firm? We encourage you to read through the below information defining our model, the qualifications we look for in legal consultants, and what you can expect in our recruiting process. We look forward to hearing from you!

InCloudCounsel is a legal technology company that helps some of the world’s best corporate lawyers achieve the freedom to practice law without the traditional geographic or time constraints of a large law firm. We offer a flexible yet consistent work arrangement that allows lawyers to pursue their other passions in life, whether they’re launching a business or solo practice, traveling the world, or starting a family.

InCloudCounsel lawyers utilize our cloud-based platform, which provides the ability to work remotely and practice law for top-tier companies across Asset Management, Infrastructure, Real Estate, and other industries. Lawyers working with InCloudCounsel are backed by a full-time team of experienced account managers and software engineers dedicated to making the experience as efficient and rewarding as possible. We also take care of most administrative needs, such as billing and document management, allowing lawyers to stay focused on practicing law.

**InCloudCounsel Lawyer Qualifications:**

- Transactional background with a Magic Circle or AmLaw50 law firm
- Experience drafting and negotiating Private Equity, M&A and Corporate Finance documents
- Experience working with Asset Management, Investment Banking, or Real Estate clientele as a Corporate lawyer
- Technologically savvy, experience with Google for Business a plus
- Excellent oral and written communication skills
- Commitment to client service
- Interest in leveraging technology to build efficiencies
- Admitted as a solicitor of England & Wales

**Recruiting Process:**

- First Round Phone Screen
- Second Round Phone Interview
- Reference Checks
- Onboarding and User Setup
- Client Engagement

**Apply to join our network of top-tier lawyers now!**

jobs.title: Asia-Pacific Legal Consultant | Remote | Part-Time
jobs.description:
Interested in becoming a consultant on our platform? We encourage you to read through the below information defining our model, the qualifications we look for, and what you can expect in our recruiting process. We look forward to hearing from you!

InCloudCounsel is looking for consultants with corporate transactional experience to support our clients in the APAC region. Native or professional proficiency in **English** required. Professional proficiency in **Mandarin** a plus. 

* * *

InCloudCounsel is a legal technology company that helps some of the world’s best corporate lawyers and consultants achieve the freedom to practice law without the traditional geographic or time constraints of a large law firm. We offer a flexible yet consistent work arrangement that allows lawyers to pursue their other passions in life, whether they’re launching a business or solo practice, traveling the world, or starting a family.

InCloudCounsel lawyers and consultants utilize our cloud-based platform, which provides the ability to work remotely and support top-tier companies across Asset Management, Investment Banking, Real Estate, and other industries. Lawyers and consultants working with InCloudCounsel are backed by a full-time team of experienced account managers (who are former Big Law associates) and software engineers dedicated to making the experience as efficient and rewarding as possible. We also take care of most administrative needs, such as billing and document management, allowing our partners to stay focused on serving the client.

**InCloudCounsel Qualifications:**

- Transactional background with an AmLaw50 or Magic Circle law firm
- Experience working with Asset Management, Investment Banking, or Real Estate clientele
- Technologically savvy, experience with Google enterprise a plus
- Excellent oral and written communication skills
- Commitment to client service
- Interest in leveraging technology to build efficiencies

**Recruiting Process:**

- First Round Phone Screen
- Second Round Phone Interview
- Reference Checks
- Onboarding and User Setup
- Client Engagement

jobs.title: Managing Director, Healthcare
jobs.description:
InCloudCounsel is seeking a **Managing Director, Healthcare** to join our rapidly growing company. InCloudCounsel modernizes legal processes, globally, for many of the world's leading companies. We offer scalable, end-to-end solutions for processing routine contracts and abstracting complex documents by pairing our worldwide network of experienced lawyers with AI-enabled software. We also offer the first purpose-built software tool designed to help funds manage their obligations. We are seeking to penetrate the healthcare market, including pharmaceuticals, biotech, medical devices, payers and providers. The Managing Director, Healthcare will be tasked with building all aspects of this business from the ground up.  

This is an extraordinary opportunity for the right person to open and lead our business in the healthcare vertical. The role will report directly to the COO and the package includes a competitive base salary, commission, and full benefits. The preferred location for this position is **New York**.

**Responsibilities**

- **Strategic Planning:** Plan and execute initial go-to-market approach for the healthcare vertical
- **New Process Development:** Work with other departments to adapt existing product and processes to address the healthcare vertical. For example:

  - Develop and test messaging and marketing collateral
  - Translate product features to a healthcare context and/or develop requirements for new features to win in the market
  - Adapt onboarding and account management practices including developing document playbooks for negotiating key healthcare contracts
  - Identify and train attorneys with the correct skill-sets to address the market
- **New Client Acquisition** : Identify targets, generate leads and help close deals with the first 10+ healthcare customers 
- **Account Management:** Manage client relationships to ensure that work is being processed appropriately, product improvements are enhancing the user experience and all revenue opportunities are being pursued
- **Attorney Management:** Work with the Attorney Engagement team to manage the InCloudCounsel attorney community, ensuring that the attorneys remain happy and engaged
- **Team Leadership:** Recruit and manage a high performing team to grow the healthcare vertical over time

**Skills & Requirements**

- 5+ years of experience at either a top tier law firm or a healthcare company in a senior contract management role 
- **Legal background:** Must have an ability to speak a legal language and empathize with both customers and attorneys
- **Facility with Contracts:** JD and/or substantial contract management experience for a pharmaceutical, medical device, biotechnology, health insurance, healthcare provider or other related company
- **Healthcare Experience:** Strong understanding of healthcare contract management (e.g. CDAs, Business Association Agreements, Vendor Contracts, Clinical Trial Agreements)
- **Self-directed:** Ability to autonomously set goals and execute on them with limited direction
- **Communication** : Excellent professional writing skills, strong interpersonal skills 
- Ability to work with remote teams

**About the Team:** We’re all about *freedom*. InCloudCounsel is on a mission to free companies from outdated legal processes and corporate lawyers from outdated work models. We’re a group of former Big Law lawyers, business professionals, and engineers working together to modernize the legal industry. The people behind developing our product, servicing our customers and lawyer partners, and driving our business operations are dynamic individuals who have also achieved the freedom to do what’s important to them - they’re musicians, dancers, photographers, sailers, surfers, world travelers, home flippers, and animal lovers - and our freedom inspires us to free others.

  **Benefits**

- Medical, dental, and vision insurance
- Generous vacation policy
- Annual professional development stipend
- Office perks including lunch and snacks
- Remote work flexibility 

* * *

In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification form upon hire.

**NOTE to External Agencies: We are not accepting any blind submissions or resumes from recruitment agencies. Any resumes sent to a member of InCloudCounsel will NOT be accepted or considered as a submission.**

jobs.title: Director, Sales
jobs.description:
We are seeking a **Director** to join the Sales team of our rapidly growing company. InCloudCounsel modernizes legal processes, globally, for many of the world's leading companies. We offer scalable, end-to-end solutions for processing routine contracts and abstracting complex documents by pairing our worldwide network of experienced lawyers with AI-enabled software. We also offer the first purpose-built software tool designed to help funds manage their obligations.

This is an extraordinary opportunity for the right corporate attorney, investment professional or investment banker to transition into a unique business role that leverages the knowledge, expertise, and network you’ve acquired thus far.

You will help lead our efforts to add new clients in our core client industries, including asset management, investment banking, and real estate. Your focus will be to leverage the success we’ve already had in acquiring a large roster of marquee clients to increase market share and propel the company to its next level of growth.

You are a charismatic and intuitive self-starter with a passion for problem-solving. If you're looking to combine your people skills and professional experience in an intellectually stimulating role, we would love to meet you. 

The role will report to the Managing Director, Sales, with whom you will work to execute our sales strategy. The compensation package includes a competitive base salary, generous commissions, and full benefits. The preferred location for this position is **Los Angeles.**

**Goals**

- Meet and exceed defined sales targets
- Acquire new customers in each of the client industry verticals we serve
- Manage all stages of the sales process, including outreach to potential clients, responding to inbound inquiries, pitching, managing a pipeline, and closing deals
- Gather frontline feedback to assist in overall strategy and new product development

**Skills & Requirements**

- **Education:** Bachelor’s required, JD preferred
- **Experience:** 3-5 years’ professional experience in corporate law, asset management (with business development exposure) or investment banking; comfortable conversing about legal issues in the transactional context
- **Background in financial services:** knowledge of target industries, an existing network within these industries, and demonstrated understanding of our clients’ businesses, industries, and needs
- **Proactive:** desire and ability to work hard, learn new skills quickly, and operate independently with minimal oversight
- **Executive presence:** ability to sell a complex product to demanding, highly sophisticated customers (i.e., senior in-house counsel, investment professionals, and investment bankers)
- **Communication and interpersonal skills:** superior written and verbal communication skills; excellent interpersonal and social skills
- **Organization:** highly organized and process-driven
- **Travel:** some travel to major financial centers for sales trips and conferences
- **Team player:** positive attitude; excited by the challenge of working in a fast-growing company to build an exceptional business

**About the Team:** We’re all about *freedom*. InCloudCounsel is on a mission to free companies from outdated legal processes and corporate lawyers from outdated work models. We’re a group of former Big Law lawyers, business professionals, and engineers working together to modernize the legal industry. The people behind developing our product, servicing our customers and lawyer partners, and driving our business operations are dynamic individuals who have also achieved the freedom to do what’s important to them - they’re musicians, dancers, photographers, sailers, surfers, world travelers, home flippers, and animal lovers - and our freedom inspires us to free others.

  **Benefits**

- Medical, dental, and vision insurance
- Generous vacation policy
- Annual professional development stipend
- Office perks including lunch and snacks
- Remote work flexibility 

* * *

In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification form upon hire.

**NOTE to External Agencies: We are not accepting any blind submissions or resumes from recruitment agencies. Any resumes sent to a member of InCloudCounsel will NOT be accepted or considered as a submission.**

jobs.title: Director, Business Development (HK/SG)
jobs.description:
InCloudCounsel is seeking a **Director** to join the Business Development, Sales and Strategy team of our rapidly growing company. InCloudCounsel modernizes legal processes, globally, for many of the world's leading companies. We offer scalable, end-to-end solutions for processing routine contracts and abstracting complex documents by pairing our worldwide network of experienced lawyers with AI-enabled software. We also offer the first purpose-built software tool designed to help funds manage their obligations. This is an extraordinary opportunity for the right corporate lawyer to transition into a unique business role that leverages the knowledge, expertise, and network you’ve acquired practising law. 

You will help lead our efforts to add new clients in our core client industries, including asset management, investment banking, and real estate as well as play a key role in determining business development and growth strategies in the APAC region. Your focus will be to leverage the success we’ve already had in acquiring a large portfolio of marquee clients in the US and Europe to increase market share and propel the company to its next level of growth in the APAC region.

The ideal candidate will have 3-5 years of experience working as a corporate lawyer at a leading law firm serving the financial services industry or equivalent experience practising in-house. Finance professionals in investment banking or private equity will also be considered, but must feel comfortable conversing about legal matters.

The role will report to the Managing Director, Sales, with whom you will work to execute our sales strategy. The compensation package includes a competitive base salary, generous commissions, and full benefits. The preferred location for this position is **Hong Kong** or **Singapore**.

**Goals:**

- Meet and exceed defined sales targets
- Acquire new customers in each of the client industry verticals we serve
- Manage all stages of the sales process, including initial client prospecting, outreach to potential clients, responding to inbound inquiries, pitching, managing a pipeline, and closing deals
- Assist in overall business development and strategies and new product development

**Skills & Requirements:**

- **Language** : Mandarin and Cantonese proficiency preferred but not required
- **Travel:** Some travel to major financial centres for sales trips and conferences as well as several weeks spent in New York for onboarding
- **Proactive**  **& entrepreneurial**** :** Desire and ability to work hard, learn new skills quickly, and operate independently with minimal oversight
- **Executive presence:** Ability to sell a complex product to demanding, highly sophisticated customers (e.g., senior internal lawyers, investment professionals, and investment bankers)
- **Background in financial services:** Knowledge of target industries, an existing network within these industries, and a demonstrated understanding of our clients’ businesses, industries, and needs
- **Communication and interpersonal skills:** Superior written and verbal communication skills; excellent interpersonal and social skills
- **Organization:** Highly organised and process-driven
- **Team player:** Positive attitude; excited by the challenge of working in a fast-growing company to build an exceptional business

**About the Team:** We’re all about *freedom*. InCloudCounsel is on a mission to free companies from outdated legal processes and corporate lawyers from outdated work models. We’re a group of former Big Law lawyers, business professionals, and engineers working together to modernize the legal industry. The people behind developing our product, servicing our customers and lawyer partners, and driving our business operations are dynamic individuals who have also achieved the freedom to do what’s important to them - they’re musicians, dancers, photographers, sailers, surfers, world travelers, home flippers, and animal lovers - and our freedom inspires us to free others.

* * *

In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification form upon hire.

**NOTE to External Agencies: We are not accepting any blind submissions or resumes from recruitment agencies. Any resumes sent to a member of InCloudCounsel will NOT be accepted or considered as a submission.**

- **Travel:** some travel to major financial centers for sales trips and conferences
- **Team player:** positive attitude; excited by the challenge of working in a fast-growing company to build an exceptional business

**About the Team:** We’re all about *freedom*. InCloudCounsel is on a mission to free companies from outdated legal processes and corporate lawyers from outdated work models. We’re a group of former Big Law lawyers, business professionals, and engineers working together to modernize the legal industry. The people behind developing our product, servicing our customers and lawyer partners, and driving our business operations are dynamic individuals who have also achieved the freedom to do what’s important to them - they’re musicians, dancers, photographers, sailers, surfers, world travelers, home flippers, and animal lovers - and our freedom inspires us to free others.

  **Benefits**

- Medical, dental, and vision insurance
- Generous vacation policy
- Annual professional development stipend
- Office perks including lunch and snacks
- Remote work flexibility 

* * *

In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification form upon hire.

**NOTE to External Agencies: We are not accepting any blind submissions or resumes from recruitment agencies. Any resumes sent to a member of InCloudCounsel will NOT be accepted or considered as a submission.**
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We are seeking a Director to join the Sales team of our rapidly growing company. InCloudCounsel modernizes legal processes, globally, for many of the world's leading companies. We offer scalable, end-to-end solutions for processing routine contracts and abstracting complex documents by pairing our worldwide network of experienced lawyers with AI-enabled software. We also offer the first purpose-built software tool designed to help funds manage their obligations.

This is an extraordinary opportunity for the right corporate attorney, investment professional or investment banker to transition into a unique business role that leverages the knowledge, expertise, and network you’ve acquired thus far.

You will help lead our efforts to add new clients in our core client industries, including asset management, investment banking, and real estate. Your focus will be to leverage the success we’ve already had in acquiring a large roster of marquee clients to increase market share and propel the company to its next level of growth.

You are a charismatic and intuitive self-starter with a passion for problem-solving. If you're looking to combine your people skills and professional experience in an intellectually stimulating role, we would love to meet you.

The role will report to the Managing Director, Sales, with whom you will work to execute our sales strategy. The compensation package includes a competitive base salary, generous commissions, and full benefits. The preferred location for this position is San Francisco.

Goals

  • Meet and exceed defined sales targets
  • Acquire new customers in each of the client industry verticals we serve
  • Manage all stages of the sales process, including outreach to potential clients, responding to inbound inquiries, pitching, managing a pipeline, and closing deals
  • Gather frontline feedback to assist in overall strategy and new product development

Skills & Requirements

  • Education: Bachelor’s required, JD preferred
  • Experience: 3-5 years’ professional experience in corporate law, asset management (with business development exposure) or investment banking; comfortable conversing about legal issues in the transactional context
  • Background in financial services: knowledge of target industries, an existing network within these industries, and demonstrated understanding of our clients’ businesses, industries, and needs
  • Proactive: desire and ability to work hard, learn new skills quickly, and operate independently with minimal oversight
  • Executive presence: ability to sell a complex product to demanding, highly sophisticated customers (i.e., senior in-house counsel, investment professionals, and investment bankers)
  • Communication and interpersonal skills: superior written and verbal communication skills; excellent interpersonal and social skills
  • Organization: highly organized and process-driven
  • Travel: some travel to major financial centers for sales trips and conferences
  • Team player: positive attitude; excited by the challenge of working in a fast-growing company to build an exceptional business

About the Team: We’re all about freedom. InCloudCounsel is on a mission to free companies from outdated legal processes and corporate lawyers from outdated work models. We’re a group of former Big Law lawyers, business professionals, and engineers working together to modernize the legal industry. The people behind developing our product, servicing our customers and lawyer partners, and driving our business operations are dynamic individuals who have also achieved the freedom to do what’s important to them - they’re musicians, dancers, photographers, sailers, surfers, world travelers, home flippers, and animal lovers - and our freedom inspires us to free others.

Benefits

  • Medical, dental, and vision insurance
  • Generous vacation policy
  • Annual professional development stipend
  • Office perks including lunch and snacks
  • Remote work flexibility

In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification form upon hire.

NOTE to External Agencies: We are not accepting any blind submissions or resumes from recruitment agencies. Any resumes sent to a member of InCloudCounsel will NOT be accepted or considered as a submission.

jobs.title: French and English-Speaking Corporate Lawyer | Remote | Part-Time
jobs.description:
Interested in becoming a lawyer on our platform? We encourage you to read through the below information defining our model, the qualifications we look for in new lawyer partners, and what you can expect in our recruiting process. We look forward to hearing from you!

InCloudCounsel is a legal technology company that helps some of the world’s best corporate lawyers achieve the freedom to practice law without the traditional geographic or time constraints of a large law firm. We offer a flexible yet consistent work arrangement that allows lawyers to pursue their other passions in life, whether they’re launching a business or solo practice, traveling the world, or starting a family.

InCloudCounsel lawyers utilize our cloud-based platform, which provides the ability to work remotely and practice law for top-tier companies across Asset Management, Investment Banking, Real Estate, and other industries. Lawyers working with InCloudCounsel are backed by a full-time team of experienced account managers and software engineers dedicated to making the experience as efficient and rewarding as possible. We also take care of most administrative needs, such as billing and document management, allowing lawyers to stay focused on practicing law.

**InCloudCounsel Lawyer Qualifications:**

- Professional fluency in English and French required
- Transactional background with an AmLaw50, Magic Circle, or other large international law firm
- Experience working with Private Equity or Investment Banking clients
- Technologically savvy, experience with Google for Business a plus
- Excellent oral and written communication skills
- Commitment to client service
- Interest in leveraging technology to build efficiencies
- Licensed to practice law
- Maintains active professional indemnity insurance cover

**Recruiting Process:**

- First Round Phone Screen
- Second Round Phone Interview
- Reference Checks
- Onboarding and User Setup
- Client Engagement

**Apply to join our network of top-tier lawyers now!**
